# ttables

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of ttables is to make it easy to create nicely formatted Typst tables using R.

## Installation

You can install the development version of **`ttables`** from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("rosswilson-nz/ttables")
```
